definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: The negative feedback of arc voltage makes the MIG welding machine to output constant-voltage external characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 電弧電壓負反饋使焊機獲得平外特性輸出。

sentences.english: The improvement of intermodulation distortion with series negative feedback is given quantitatively.
sentences.chinese: 定量地給出了串聯負反饋對互調失真的改善程度。

sentences.english: Positive feedback has the opposite effect, reinforcing a change in the system.
sentences.chinese: 正反饋作用和負反饋相反，它加劇了生態系統的變化。

sentences.english: While working on a means of reducing amplifier distortion, he devised the negative feedback amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 在研究減少放大器失真方法時他發明了負反饋放大器。
